name: BATTLE ARENA: The GAME Show !
description:
A game made for the Beginners Circle Jam #4, my first game jam. Story:

You are a contestant in a TV show that seems like a gladiators' fight. Will you manage to get the spectators good votes and get a boost in speed, damage, health,... or will your performance not satisfy them and will have more and more obstacles in your battles?

Try to get the 1 Million Canadian dollar price (hm... not for real), and beware of the Presenter.

Controls:
  • AD for left and right.
  • Space to jump
  • Mouse left click to hit
  • Mouse right click to block
  • E to continue persistant dialogue

I wanted to focus on the programming part so I made the choice to use assets from outside sources.

  • Sprites for characters and background:

Unity Assets Store "Bandits" https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/bandits-pixel-art-104130

Craftpix Freebies "Free Shield 2D" https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-shield-2d-game-assets-pack/

  • Musics : 

Jonathan So (on itch.io) https://jonathan-so.itch.io/creatorpack

  • SFX: 

SoundImage https://soundimage.org/

GroovyMaster (on itch.io) https://groovymaster.itch.io/groovys-50-retro-sound-effects-package

  • UI and fonts:

Kenney Fonts and Kenney UI Pack Space Expansion

https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts

https://kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack-space-expansion

  • A huge help came from following the following sources:

-Brackeys https://www.youtube.com/c/Brackeys/videos

-Game Development Tutsplus tutorials on How to save and load your players https://gamedevelopment.tutsplus.com/tutorials/how-to-save-and-load-your-players...

I hope you will enjoy this game at least as much as I enjoy making it!

It is not fully finished yet, some fixs will be done until December 11th 2020. 

Let a message if you feel like it and want to tell me what you think about it.

P.S: 

If there is some problems with the game in browser, a Windows version is available to download.
